achievement.title: NGV Website Redesign
achievement.description: Launched just in time for the NGV Gala and the opening of the _Escher x Nendo_ exhibition.

achievement.title: Best Website 2018
achievement.description: NEWi Award went to Out of the Square Media for my work on the [OOTS website](https://www.outofthesquare.com).

achievement.title: Baldessin / Whiteley
achievement.description: I worked on this landing page for the [Baldessin / Whiteley](https://www.ngv.vic.gov.au/exhibition/baldessin-whiteley/) exhibition at NGV Australia.

achievement.title: Revolver Returns
achievement.description: First solo performance as *Whalebones* at Revolver Upstairs, Windsor.

achievement.title: Started at NGV
achievement.description: I joined National Gallery of Victoria as in-house web designer / developer.
